overview: No Partner Needed! Get your dancing shoes on and step out with this exclusive dance workout inspired by the #1 dance movie of all time, Dirty Dancing! Now you can learn to move like Baby and Johnny with original dance steps and soundtrack favorites from the legendary movie. Have the time of your life and get fit to Johnny's Mambo, Penny's Grapevine and so much more! What are you waiting for? Get out of the corner, baby, and dance!
tagline: Get Fit and Have the Time of Your Life!
title: Dirty Dancing: Official Dance Workout
